sense.def: Pathological Condition of nüe ji 瘧疾 , malaria ailment, associated with mental conditions such as heart vexation and, in extreme cases, mental confusion, madness, and restlessness. Su wen 素問 36: 心瘧者，令人煩心甚，欲得清水，反寒多，不甚熱, “ Heart malaria : it causes a person’s heart to be very vexed. [Patients] long for cool water. Contrary [to what might be expected,] they are often cold and not very hot”.
